resources.string: This is a work in progress!
What a glorious day for battle!!

string-array.name: flavor_toasts
string-array.item: That Checker only had 3 days until retirement.
There is never victory without sacrifice
That checker is gone but not forgotten
That checker pain the ultimate price.
That checker will never see his dog again
Another checker wife becomes a checker widow
That checker would have had a birthday tomorrow
The battle is won, but at what cost?
The battle is won, but at what cost?
The battle is won, but at what cost?
